com.bobman159.rundml.core.sql.sql.conditions

Class SQLCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bobman159.rundml.core.sql.sql.conditions.SQLCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICaseWhenValue, ISQLCondition

    public class SQLCondition
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISQLCondition
    Represents a condition (eg COL01 = 10, 10 > 20) in an SQL statement.

      • createSQLCondition

        public static SQLCondition createSQLCondition(ISQLCondition condition,
                                              Op op,
                                              ISQLType rightExpr)
        Defines an SQL condition which is evaluated as true or false.
        Parameters:
        condition - partially defined (left expression) sql condition
        op - the operator (><,<>,=") etc.
        rightExpr - the SQL expression on the right side of the operand
        Returns:
        the SQL condition model definition
